participant_1.background:
I usually start my day with a workout to get my body moving and my mind sharp.
i enjoy fishing.
I'm not the healthiest person, but I do enjoy touring with Frank Ocean and I love ice cream.
I am single because my time is devoted to rescuing animals.
I am a student and my family is in business.

participant_2.background:
I like to use websites that help me learn about music and color theory.
i also eat too much french fries.
I want to take my uniform off and relax.
My longest relationship was with my wife, but she doesn't like me anymore.
I am single, but I am happy and content with my life, because I have my writing to keep me busy.

content.text: Not bad, not bad. I'm on my way home from a long day at work.
Oh, I know the feeling. I just got home from work myself.
What do you do for work?
I'm a student, but I also work part-time as a tour guide.
That sounds interesting. I've always wanted to be a tour guide.
It's fun, but it can be a lot of work.
I bet. What's your favorite part about it?
I love getting to meet new people and learning about different cultures.
That sounds cool. I'm a musician, and I love learning about music and color theory.
That's awesome! I love music too.
I like a lot of different genres, but I'm especially into indie rock and hip-hop.
Nice. I'm more into blues and jazz.
Cool. We should listen to some music together sometime.
